price: “Nyagasani wacu! Bahe ibihano byikubye kabiri, unabavume umuvumo ukomeye.”
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ātihim ḍiʿ'fayni mina al-ʿadhābi wal-ʿanhum laʿnan kabīran
